description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 6/13/2006

Bridget tries to discourage Dante from loving her because she doesn’t want to hurt Felicia, but he insists he will need to call off the wedding. Dante is on his way over to tell Felicia that he wants a life with Bridget but when he arrives he discovers Felicia flew his whole family in from Italy to meet Dino and be present at their wedding.  Felicia then announces to a shocked Bridget, Dante and the entire family that she has pushed the wedding up to happen in a couple of days. Ridge tries to tell Nick that Brooke is not over him.
